title: Me and the monsters
creator_credit: Bill Cleary, Alcohol and Drug Foundation and Billy Budd Films
brief_description: Once upon a time there was a boy who had trouble - and his trouble was monsters. And whenever he had trouble, he saw monsters. A vieled animated instructional film for children advocating piece-of-mind, safety, antidrugs and racial harmony. Song written and perfomrd by Bill Cleary.
